directions: Heat oil in large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add potatoes and ginger; sauté until potatoes are lightly browned, about 3 minutes. Mix in cauliflower, then salt, turmeric, chili powder and paprika; sauté 5 minutes. Add 1/2 cup water; cover and simmer until vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes. Add peas and simmer 2 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 1 pound russet potatoes, peeled, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
4 cups cauliflower florets, cut into bite-size pieces
title: Indian Potatoes, Peas and Cauliflower
